00037 uvm_schedule::uvm_schedule(sc_module_name name) :
00038     sc_module(name),
00039     _top_phase(NULL),
00040     _next_phase(NULL),
00041     _current_phase(NULL),
00042     _bcontinue(true),
00043     _bsim_start(false)
00044 {
00045 }

00047 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 // Destructor: uvm_schedule
00049 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 uvm_schedule::~uvm_schedule()
00051 {
00052     std::map<std::string, uvm_phase*>::iterator it;
00053 
00054     for (it = _phase_map.begin(); it != _phase_map.end(); it++)
00055     {
00056         if (it->second != NULL)
00057             delete it->second;
00058     }
00059     _phase_map.clear();
00060 }

00062 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 // Function: set_top_phase
00064 //   Set the starting phase for this schedule
00065 //
00066 // Parameters:
00067 //   name - name of top phase
00068 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 void uvm_schedule::set_top_phase(string name)
00070 {
00071     _top_phase = _phase_map[name];
00072     _current_phase = _top_phase;
00073 
00074     if (_top_phase == NULL)
00075         cout << "ERROR: set_top_phase::unknown phase " << name << endl;
00076 }

00136 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 // Function: add_phase
00138 //   Add a phase to the schedule and returns the phase pointer.
00139 //
00140 // Parameters:
00141 //  name - name of phase to add
00142 //
00143 // Returns:
00144 //   phase - pointer to phase
00145 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 uvm_phase* uvm_schedule::add_phase(string name, uvm_phase_type type, uvm_phase_order order)
00147 {
00148     uvm_phase* phase;
00149 
00150     phase = new uvm_phase(name, this, type, order);
00151     _phase_map[name] = phase;
00152 
00153     return phase;
00154 }

00163 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 void uvm_schedule::add_phase(uvm_phase* pphase)

00169 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 // Function: add_arc
00171 //   Add an arc
00172 //
00173 // Parameters:
00174 //  from_phase - name of phase arc starts from
00175 //  to_phase   - name of phase arc goes to
00176 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 void uvm_schedule::add_arc(string from_phase, string to_phase, unsigned int priority)
00178 {
00179     uvm_phase* pfrom_phase = _phase_map[from_phase];
00180     uvm_phase* pto_phase   = _phase_map[to_phase];
00181     
00182     if (pfrom_phase == NULL)
00183         cout << "ERROR : add_arc:: phase does not exist " << from_phase << endl;
00184     else if (pto_phase == NULL)
00185         cout << "ERROR : add_arc:: phase does not exist " << to_phase << endl;
00186     else
00187         pfrom_phase->add_next_phase(pto_phase, priority);
00188 
00189 
00190 }
00191 
00192 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 // Function: add_arc
00194 //   Add an arc
00195 //
00196 // Parameters:
00197 //  from_phase - pointer of phase arc starts from
00198 //  to_phase   - pointer of phase arc goes to
00199 //
00200 // Returns:
00201 //  status - return false if either phase pointer does not exists in the pool
00202 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00203 void uvm_schedule::add_arc(uvm_phase* pfrom_phase, uvm_phase* pto_phase, unsigned int priority)
00204 {
00205     add_arc(pfrom_phase->get_name(), pto_phase->get_name(), priority);
00206 }

00220     {
00221         cout << "ERROR : go_to_phase:: phase does not exist " << name << endl;
00222     }
00223     else
00224     {
00225         _current_phase->go_to_phase(pphase);
00226     }
00227 
00228 }

00259 void uvm_schedule::start_schedule(uvm_component* pcomp)
00260 {
00261     if (_current_phase == NULL) return;
00262 
00263     sc_process_handle proccess_h;
00264 
00265     while ((_current_phase != NULL) &&
00266             (_bcontinue))
00267     {
00268         execute_schedule(pcomp);
00269         if (_current_phase->get_phase_state() == UVM_PHASE_DONE)
00270             _current_phase = _next_phase;
00271     }
00272 }
00273 
00274 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00275 // Function: execute
00276 //   Main execution for schedule
00277 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00278 void uvm_schedule::execute_schedule(uvm_component *pcomp)
00279 {
00280     uvm_phase* next_phase;
00281     bool bready;
00282 
00283     if (_current_phase == NULL)
00284     {
00285         cout << "WARNING: uvm_schedule::execute_schedule() current phase is NULL" << endl;
00286         return;
00287     }
00288 
00289     if (_current_phase->get_phase_type() == UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE)
00290         execute_runtime_phase(pcomp);
00291     else
00292         execute_nonruntime_phase(pcomp);
00293 }
00294 
00295 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00296 // Function: execute_nonruntime_phase
00297 //   Main execution for non-runtime phases
00298 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00299 void uvm_schedule::execute_nonruntime_phase(uvm_component *pcomp)
00300 {
00301     uvm_phase* next_phase;
00302     bool bready;
00303     sc_process_handle barrier_h;
00304     uvm_phase_state phase_state = _current_phase->get_phase_state();
00305 
00306     switch(phase_state)
00307     {
00308     case UVM_PHASE_DORMANT:
00309         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START);
00310 
00311         break;
00312 
00313     case UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START:
00314         bready = _current_phase->is_sync_point_ready(UVM_SYNC_AT_START);
00315 
00316         if (!bready)
00317             _current_phase->wait_ready_to_start();
00318 
00319         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING);
00320 
00321     case UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING:
00322 
00323         _current_phase->execute(pcomp);
00324         //_current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_ENDED);
00325         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_DONE);
00326         _next_phase = _current_phase->get_next_phase();
00327         _current_phase->clear_next_phase_req();      // clear out next phase request list
00328 
00329         break;
00330     case UVM_PHASE_ENDED:
00331         _next_phase = _current_phase->get_next_phase();
00332         _current_phase->clear_next_phase_req();      // clear out next phase request list
00333         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_DONE);
00334 
00335         break;
00336     default:
00337         cout << "ERROR: invalid state" << endl;
00338         break;
00339     };
00340 }
00341 
00342 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00343 // Function: execute_runtime_phase
00344 //   Main execution for runtime phases
00345 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00346 void uvm_schedule::execute_runtime_phase(uvm_component *pcomp)
00347 {
00348     uvm_phase* next_phase;
00349     bool bready;
00350     sc_process_handle barrier_h;
00351     uvm_phase_state phase_state = _current_phase->get_phase_state();
00352     sc_time dur(5, SC_NS);
00353 
00354     switch(phase_state)
00355     {
00356     case UVM_PHASE_DORMANT:
00357         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START);
00358 
00359         break;
00360 
00361     case UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START:
00362         if (!_bsim_start)
00363         {
00364             wait(_sim_start_ev);
00365             }
00366 
00367         bready = _current_phase->is_sync_point_ready(UVM_SYNC_AT_START);
00368 
00369         if (!bready)
00370             _current_phase->wait_ready_to_start();
00371 
00372         _current_phase->execute(pcomp);
00373         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING);
00374         break;
00375     case UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING:
00376 
00377         _current_phase->execute(pcomp);
00378         barrier_h = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_schedule::wait_barrier, this));
00379         wait(barrier_h.terminated_event());
00380 
00381         bready = _current_phase->is_sync_point_ready(UVM_SYNC_AT_END);
00382         if (!bready)
00383             _current_phase->wait_ready_to_end();
00384 
00385         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END);
00386         break;
00387     case UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END:
00388         _current_phase->execute(pcomp);
00389         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_ENDED);
00390         break;
00391     case UVM_PHASE_ENDED:
00392         _current_phase->execute(pcomp);
00393         _next_phase = _current_phase->get_next_phase();
00394         _current_phase->clear_next_phase_req();      // clear out next phase request list
00395         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_DONE);
00396 
00397         break;
00398     default:
00399         break;
00400     };
00401 }
00402 
00403 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00404 // Function: init
00405 //   Initialize the schedule
00406 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00407 void uvm_schedule::init(void)
00408 {
00409     if (_top_phase == NULL)
00410     {
00411         cout << "uvm_schedule::init - top phase not set for schedule - " << name() << endl;
00412         exit(1);
00413     }
00414 
00415     _current_phase = _top_phase;
00416     _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START);
00417 
00418     //TODO
00419     //uvm_component* pcomp = uvm_get_top();
00420     uvm_component* pcomp = NULL;
00421     // TODO: a non uvm_component top or no top, don't execute
00422     if (pcomp == NULL)
00423     {
00424         cout << "uvm_schedule::init - no top component detected, exiting" << endl;
00425     }
00426     else
00427     {
00428         sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_schedule::start_schedule, this, pcomp));
00429     }
00430 }

00433 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00434 // Function: wait_barrier
00435 //   Wait for barrier to be cleared
00436 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00437 void uvm_schedule::wait_barrier(void)
00438 {
00439     _current_phase->barrier.wait();
00440 }

00462 //   Start of simulation call back from SystemC
00463 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00464 void uvm_schedule::start_of_simulation()
00465 {
00466     _bsim_start = true;
00467     _sim_start_ev.notify();
00468 }

00470 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00471 // Function: register_callback
00472 //   Register component to all phases in schedule
00473 //
00474 // Parameter:
00475 //   pcomp - ptr to component
00476 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00477 void uvm_schedule::register_callback(uvm_component* pcomp)
00478 {
00479     std::map<string, uvm_phase*>::iterator it;
00480 
00481     for (it = _phase_map.begin(); it != _phase_map.end(); it++)
00482     {
00483         it->second->register_comp_callback(pcomp);
00484     }
00485 }

00487 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00488 // Function: execute_phase
00489 //   
00490 //
00491 // Parameter:
00492 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00493 int uvm_schedule::execute_phase(string phase_name, uvm_phase_state state, sc_core::sc_module* pmod)
00494 {
00495     uvm_phase *pphase = _phase_map[phase_name]; 
00496     char msg[1024];
00497 
00498     if (pphase == NULL)
00499     {
00500         if (phase_name.compare("resolve_bindings") == 0)
00501         {
00502             return 1;
00503         }
00504         else
00505         {
00506             sprintf(msg, "phase = %s", phase_name.c_str());
00507             return 0;
00508         }
00509     }
00510 
00511     _current_phase = pphase;
00512     _current_phase->set_phase_state(state);
00513     _current_phase->execute(pmod);
00514 
00515     return 1;
00516 }
00517 
00518 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00519 // Function: execute_quasi_static_phase
00520 //   
00521 //
00522 // Parameter:
00523 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00524 int uvm_schedule::execute_quasi_static_phase(string phase_name, uvm_phase_state state)
00525 {
00526     char msg[1024];
00527     uvm_phase *pphase = _phase_map[phase_name]; 
00528     static bool bresolve_bindings = false;
00529 
00530 
00531     if ( (phase_name.compare("resolve_bindings") == 0) &&
00532          (state == UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING)  &&
00533          (bresolve_bindings == false) )
00534     {
00535         bresolve_bindings = true;
00536         QUASI_STATIC_COMPLETE_BINDING();
00537         return 1;
00538     }
00539 
00540     if (pphase == NULL)
00541     {
00542         sprintf(msg, "phase = %s", phase_name.c_str());
00543         return 1; // It's legitimate to receive notification about the unknown phase
00544     }
00545 
00546     _current_phase = pphase;
00547     _current_phase->set_phase_state(state);
00548 
00549     if (state == uvm::UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START)
00550         return _current_phase->start();
00551     else if (state == uvm::UVM_PHASE_ENDED)
00552         return _current_phase->end();
00553     else    
00554         return 1;
00555 }
